#!/bin/bash

# This script carries out all pre-processing steps for 16S rRNA gene sequences generated by Illumina sequencing.

#1 Use flash to merge Read 1 and Read 2 for each sample file. 
echo -e "\n\n Using flash to merge Read 1 and Read 2 for each sample file.\n\n"

#Maize Seq
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0021  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0021_GTGCTCATGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0021_GTGCTCATGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0022  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0022_GAGTGCATCT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0022_GAGTGCATCT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0023  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0023_GCGATGATGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0023_GCGATGATGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0024  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0024_TCATGCGCGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0024_TCATGCGCGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0025  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0025_GTGCGTGTGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0025_GTGCGTGTGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0026  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0026_GAGCTAGTGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0026_GAGCTAGTGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0027  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0027_CTATACAGTG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0027_CTATACAGTG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0028  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0028_CGTATCTCGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0028_CGTATCTCGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0029  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0029_TGCGTAGTCG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0029_TGCGTAGTCG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0030  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0030_TGTCGAGTCA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0030_TGTCGAGTCA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0041  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0041_CTGTAGTGCG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0041_CTGTAGTGCG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0042  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0042_CAGTCAGAGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0042_CAGTCAGAGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0043  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0043_CTATCGCGTG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0043_CTATCGCGTG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0044  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0044_GATGTAGCGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0044_GATGTAGCGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0045  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0045_GTGCTGTCGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0045_GTGCTGTCGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0046  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0046_TGCTATGCTG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0046_TGCTATGCTG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0047  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0047_GTGCGCTAGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0047_GTGCGCTAGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0048  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0048_CGCAGTCTAT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0048_CGCAGTCTAT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0049  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0049_TACGCTGCTG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0049_TACGCTGCTG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0050  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0050_CTGCATGATC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0050_CTGCATGATC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0111  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0111_TACTGCAGCG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0111_TACTGCAGCG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0112  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0112_TGTACAGCGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0112_TGTACAGCGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0113  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0113_CGACGCTGAT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0113_CGACGCTGAT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0114  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0114_GATACACTGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0114_GATACACTGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0115  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0115_TACGTATAGC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0115_TACGTATAGC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0116  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0116_CGATGACAGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0116_CGATGACAGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0117  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0117_TACACAGTAG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0117_TACACAGTAG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0118  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0118_ACGTCAGTAT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0118_ACGTCAGTAT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0119  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0119_CTACGATCAG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0119_CTACGATCAG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0120  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0120_GACTAGTCAG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0120_GACTAGTCAG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0171  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0171_CTACATACTA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0171_CTACATACTA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0172  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0172_AGCATCTATA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0172_AGCATCTATA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0173  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0173_ATACAGTCTC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0173_ATACAGTCTC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0174  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0174_ATGCTAGAGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0174_ATGCTAGAGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0175  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0175_TAGCATACAG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0175_TAGCATACAG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0176  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0176_TGATGTATGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0176_TGATGTATGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0177  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0177_ATCAGTGTAT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0177_ATCAGTGTAT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0178  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0178_AGACTATATC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0178_AGACTATATC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0179  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0179_CATAGACGTG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0179_CATAGACGTG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0180  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0180_AGCAGTACTC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0180_AGCAGTACTC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0181  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0181_AGAGTCGCGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0181_AGAGTCGCGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0182  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0182_GATATATGTC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0182_GATATATGTC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0183  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0183_ATCATATCTC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0183_ATCATATCTC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0184  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0184_CAGCATCTAG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0184_CAGCATCTAG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0185  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0185_AGAGATATCA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0185_AGAGATATCA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0186  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0186_ATCTAGATCA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0186_ATCTAGATCA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0187  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0187_TCTACGACAT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0187_TCTACGACAT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0188  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0188_TAGTACTAGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0188_TAGTACTAGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0189  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0189_AGTAGATCAT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0189_AGTAGATCAT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0190  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0190_CGAGACGACA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0190_CGAGACGACA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0191  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0191_ATGCTGCGCT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0191_ATGCTGCGCT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0192  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0192_ATCGCATAGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0192_ATCGCATAGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0193  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0193_TTGTTGCTGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0193_TTGTTGCTGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0194  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0194_GGTCAGTGTA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0194_GGTCAGTGTA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0195  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0195_CTCTTAGTTC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0195_CTCTTAGTTC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0196  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0196_TACTAGGATC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0196_TACTAGGATC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0197  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0197_TGGTGCTGGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0197_TGGTGCTGGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0198  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0198_TTCTGTTGCC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0198_TTCTGTTGCC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0199  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0199_GTGTGGTTGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0199_GTGTGGTTGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0200  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0200_GTAATGGAGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0200_GTAATGGAGT_R2.fastq  
##Teosinte Seqs
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0300  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0300_AGTTGCTAGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0300_AGTTGCTAGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0301  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0301_GCATAATCGC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0301_GCATAATCGC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0302  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0302_CTCTGGACGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0302_CTCTGGACGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0303  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0303_GCAGATAAGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0303_GCAGATAAGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0304  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0304_GCATGCCAGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0304_GCATGCCAGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0305  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0305_GTACTAAGAG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0305_GTACTAAGAG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0306  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0306_AGGATTGAGG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0306_AGGATTGAGG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0307  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0307_GTCGTAACAC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0307_GTCGTAACAC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0308  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0308_CGAGCATTGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0308_CGAGCATTGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0309  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0309_GTCGGCTCTA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0309_GTCGGCTCTA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0310  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0310_GGAGACTGTA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0310_GGAGACTGTA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0311  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0311_GAAGTCAAGC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0311_GAAGTCAAGC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0312  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0312_CCAGAACAGA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0312_CCAGAACAGA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0313  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0313_GAGATTGCTA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0313_GAGATTGCTA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0314  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0314_CCAAGAAGAA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0314_CCAAGAAGAA_R2.fastq

flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0318  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0318_CGTCAAGCAT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0318_CGTCAAGCAT_R2.fastq

flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0356  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0356_ACTCAGTTAC_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0356_ACTCAGTTAC_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0357  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0357_AAGCGTAGAA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0357_AAGCGTAGAA_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0358  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0358_AATCGAGCGT_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0358_AATCGAGCGT_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0359  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0359_ACTTAGAGAG_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0359_ACTTAGAGAG_R2.fastq  
flash -M 215 -o MM2015-0360  -d      V4_515F_New_MM2015_0360_AGGTAGCTCA_R1.fastq  V4_515F_New_MM2015_0360_AGGTAGCTCA_R2.fastq  

#2 rename individual sequences within each sample file
echo -e "\n\n Renaming individual sequences within each sample file.\n\n"

perl IlluminaFastQ_Rename.pl


#3 Combine individual sample fasta files into a single fasta file for the project/run.
echo -e "\n\n Combining fastq files of individual samples into a single fastq file.\n\n"

cat *renamed.fastq > 00_All-Samples.fastq


#4 Filter sequences for quality.
echo -e "\n\nFiltering sequences based on quality.\n-q 30 : 99.9% minimum base accuracy\n-p 90 : percent bases in each sequence that pass the quality threshold)\n\n"

fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i 00_All-Samples.fastq -o 00_All-Samples-Filtered.fastq  -v | tee fastq_quality_filter_log.txt


#5 Strip out quality information
echo -e "\n\nStripping out quality information and convert file to .fasta\n\n"

fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i 00_All-Samples-Filtered.fastq -o 00_All-Samples-Filtered.fasta -v | tee fastq_to_fasta_log.txt

##We use an internal Folder Set to keep files seperate 
#6 Move fasta file to usearch folder.
#echo -e "\n\nMoving fasta file to usearch folder. Remember to change to the 02_usearch directory. \n\n"

#mv '00_All-Samples-Filtered.fasta' '../02_usearch/00_All-Samples-Filtered.fasta'
